question: In Kanazawa City, Japan, what is the name of the museum dedicated to contemporary art, which opened in 2004?
true_answer: 21st Century Museum of Contemporary Art, Kanazawa
asked_question_translated: Ako sa volá múzeum súčasného umenia v japonskom meste Kanazawa, ktoré bolo otvorené v roku 2004?
answer: Múzeum súčasného umenia v japonskom meste Kanazawa, ktoré bolo otvorené v roku 2004, sa volá 21st Century Museum of Contemporary Art.
answer_translated_eng: The museum of contemporary art in Kanazawa, Japan, which opened in 2004, is called the 21st Century Museum of Contemporary Art.
